PREFIX ldt: <https://www.w3.org/ns/ldt#> PREFIX lapp: <https://w3id.org/atomgraph/linkeddatahub/apps/domain#>
DESCRIBE ?app ?service ?adminApp ?adminService ?endUserApp ?endUserService WHERE { SELECT * WHERE { ?app ldt:base ?base ; ldt:service ?service OPTIONAL { ?app lapp:adminApplication ?adminApp . ?adminApp ldt:service ?adminService } OPTIONAL { ?app lapp:endUserApplication ?endUserApp . ?endUserApp ldt:service ?endUserService } FILTER strstarts(str(?this), str(?base)) BIND(strlen(str(?base)) AS ?baseLength) } ORDER BY DESC(?baseLength) LIMIT 1 }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX describeForm: <urn:dydra:simple-concise-bounded-description> PREFIX describeSubjectDepth: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#_4> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
### ?isDefinedBy value is set from code, so the variable name cannot be changed! ### DESCRIBE ?isDefinedBy ?doc ?term WHERE { GRAPH ?ontGraph { ?isDefinedBy a ?type OPTIONAL { ?isDefinedBy foaf:isPrimaryTopicOf ?doc } } OPTIONAL { GRAPH ?termGraph { ?term rdfs:isDefinedBy ?isDefinedBy } } }
